bibl.title: The Apocryphon of Jannes and Jambres the Magicians. P. Chester Beatty XVI (with New Editions of Papyrus Vindobonensis Greek inv. 29456 + 29828 verso and British Library Cotton Tiberius B. v f. 87).
bibl.note: Edition of P. Chester Beatty XVI. Provenance unknown, late IV A.D. - New edition of P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 29456 + 29828 verso (= van Haelst 1069), identified by: Pierre MARAVAL, Fragments grecs du livre de Jannès et Jambré (Pap. Vindob. 29456 et 29828 Verso), ZPE 25 (1977) pp. 199-207.
bibl.seg: PIETERSMA Albert (Edited with Introduction, Translation and Commentary), The Apocryphon of Jannes and Jambres the Magicians. P. Chester Beatty XVI (with New Editions of Papyrus Vindobonensis Greek inv. 29456 + 29828 verso and British Library Cotton Tiberius B. v f. 87). (Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 119.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1994, 8°, xvii-349 pp., 19 pll. ISBN 90-04-09938-7.

Edition of P. Chester Beatty XVI. Provenance unknown, late IV A.D. - New edition of P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 29456 + 29828 verso (= van Haelst 1069), identified by: Pierre MARAVAL, Fragments grecs du livre de Jannès et Jambré (Pap. Vindob. 29456 et 29828 Verso), ZPE 25 (1977) pp. 199-207.
C.R. par Pierre Maraval, RHPhR 76 (1996) pp. 242-244.
